p: In the pre-genomic era, matching available and annotated ESTs from the Citrus Genome Sequencing Consortium (CitEST) database ( Forment et al., 2005) was the only way to attain this kind of studies ( Quecini et al., 2007). Using this approach, crucial stress responses in salt-tolerant (Cleopatra mandarin) and –sensitive (Carrizo citrange) citrus rootstocks have been studied ( Brumós et al., 2009), confirmed the involvement of ABA in the constitutive tolerance of tetraploid Rangpur lime ( C. limonia) ( Allario et al., 2011, 2012), the responses of a cultivated mandarin accession to water deprivation ( Gimeno et al., 2009) or the involvement of gibberellins in the regulation of photosynthesis under different abiotic stress conditions ( Huerta et al., 2009) studied.
